0.2.0 (2019-01-26)
- Pick questions according to their weight in the test (bug 1728498).
- Avoid duplicate questions (bug 1728496).
- Colorize error messages.
- Colorize correct/incorrect answers (bug 1810595).
- Add support for macOS.

0.1.2 (2018-04-02)
- Ignore invalid keypresses.

0.1.1 (2017-10-07)
- Don't require Enter when typing the answer.
- Extend the section syntax to support list of ranges.

0.1.0 (2017-09-10)
- Initial public release
